title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a simple async/sync client.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama endpoints as LLM, chat, and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now Open WebUI) with chat history, model management, and RAG plugins.

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Lightweight CLI wrapper that adds prompt templates and GitHub Copilot-style completions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for building local NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot.vim
summary: Community fork that replaces GitHub Copilot backend with local Ollama models inside Vim/Neovim.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and both sync/async APIs.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui-tools
summary: Collection of lightweight Electron and Tauri desktop apps for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-use Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama, Open WebUI, Chroma, and GPU support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a command palette to query local Ollama models and insert results into notes.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot server that answers channel mentions using any Ollama model running locally.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for Ollama REST API with async HTTP and native JSON parsing.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Production-grade RAG chatbot template using Ollama, FastAPI, Postgres pgvector, and React frontend.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama responses into Discord threads with slash commands.
